Package enigma.event

Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with events fired by Enigma components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TextMouseListener A listener which may be notified when mouse actions occur on a TextWindow
TextMouseMotionListener A listener which may be notified when mouse motion actions occur on a TextWindow
TextWindowListener A listener for receiving TextWindowEvents.
 

Class Summary
TextMouseAdapter An abstract implementation of the TextMouseListener class, with all methods stubbed out.
TextMouseEvent TextMouseEvents are fired in response to mouse clicks on TextWindows which feature mouse support.
TextWindowEvent TextWindowEvents are fired when TextWindows are resized.
 

Package enigma.event Description

Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with events fired by Enigma components.
